div.p:
大雨 (おおあめ) — heavy rain
梅雨 (つゆ) — rainy season
雨水 (あまみず) — rain water
雨量 (うりょう) — rainfall
降雨 (こうう) — rainfall
豪雨 (ごうう) — torrential rain
梅雨明け (つゆあけ) — the end of the rainy season
雨期 (うき) — rainy season
長雨 (ながあめ) — long spell of rain
小雨 (こあめ) — light rain
集中豪雨 (しゅうちゅうごうう) — local downpour
雨天 (うてん) — rainy weather
雷雨 (らいう) — thunderstorm
梅雨入り (つゆいり) — entering the rainy season
梅雨前線 (ばいうぜんせん) — seasonal rain front
風雨 (ふうう) — wind and rain
雨模様 (あまもよう) — signs of rain
雨漏り (あまもり) — roof leak
暴風雨 (あらし) — storm
時雨 (しぐれ) — drizzle

This page was generated using kanjioftheday, written by Douglas Paul Perkins. Kanji lists came from the Ministry of Education. Example words are derived from a word frequency list by Alexandre Girardi. Dictionary information is taken from KANJIDIC2 and EDICT.
